title: proposal: enbale convert []int32 to []MyInt32
body:
```Go
package main

import "fmt"

type MyInt32 int32
type MyInt32SliceA []int32
type MyInt32SliceB []MyInt32

func main() {
	var a int32
	var b = MyInt32(a)
	fmt.Println(b)

	var c []int32
	var d = MyInt32SliceA(c)
	fmt.Println(d)

	var e []int32
	var f = MyInt32SliceB(e) // cannot convert e (type []int32) to type MyInt32SliceB
	fmt.Println(f)
}
```

http://play.golang.org/p/BZ-prCewu0
